DarkMouse::
She jumped and spun around. She looked at Drillbit."BLAST! Don't 
scare me out of my skin like that. Sheesh." She looked at him,"What? 
You don't believe this mouse could live this long? Don't worry, I 
wasn't betting I'd make it either." She sat back down and put turned 
up the volume so Drillbit could listen. "Comfy aint the word. But 
this could be worth something to you. Have a seat.." She motioned to 
chair next to her. "maybe we can learn something."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He excepted her answer, and took off towards the bridge.
> He saw DarkMouse spying. It was wierd seeing her, she was believed 
dead.
> Killed in the first major battle he was in. He snuck up behind her.
> "Confromtable?!"
